events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product is not what I paid for.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized under refund requests due to the customer's dissatisfaction with the product received.
A support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and assist the customer with the next steps.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and I have attached a photo showing that the product does not match the description on your site.
Thank you for providing the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and you can keep the wrong item as a goodwill gesture.
I appreciate your quick response and the offer to keep the wrong product. Thank you for resolving this issue efficiently.
The refund has been successfully processed, and the case is now closed on our side. You should see the amount credited shortly.
Just following up to confirm that you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since the refund was received and there are no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
